title: 4ft Tablecloth Rectangular Spandex Linen - Table Cloth Fitted Cover for 4 Foot Folding Table Wedding Linens Banquet Cloths Rectangle Covers (Black)
features: Durable - Event Linens spandex table covers 4 ft are made from durable and stain resistant polyester fabric that stretches tightly with a sleek design. The fitted tablecloths will stretch to fit a 4ft folding table or standard 4 foot display table or banquet tables. The black and white tablecloth can be used with a table skirt to match any decor. Folding table cover stain resistance means great for parties, manteles para fiestas!

Professional - Many colors available to match any event! Don't let the wind blow your table cover ever again! The 4ft spandex tablecloth is designed with reinforced elastic foot pockets.  Great as a party tablecloth, wedding tablecloths, banquet tablecloth, massage bed cover, lash bed cover, dj accessories, conference table covering or any 4 ft folding table that matches the dimensions listed.

Lightweight - Lightweight, yet strong linen tablecloth. Stretchable fitted table cover for party table and vendor events. Our spandex table cover are popular for wedding table clothes to give your table a canopy covering for your 4 ft table.  With the elastic table cover rectangle shape, the elastic tablecloth is easy to install quickly and easily as your party table cloth for your craft topper, tradeshow tablecover and even in the kitchen.

Easy Cleaning - Our cloth tablecloth is stain resistant AND wrinkle resistant, something our competitors can't claim, so it works well as a party table cover. The elastic tablecloth rectangular scrim is coated to resist stains.  Watch liquids bead up on the elastic table cloths rectangle shape and clean easily. The 4foot stretchy table cloth does not require any ironing and is machine washable.

Sleek and professional rectangle tablecloth - The stretch tablecloth fits tables that are 48x30.  Dims are 48"L X 30"W X 30"H. Event Linens stretchable tablecloth is made thicker with 200 gsm spandex tablecloth material.  For a great expandex tablecloth also check out our other colors and sizes for your rectangular tablecloth.
description: Our spandex 4ft tablecloths offer a strechy sleek and professional look as a large tablecloth topper. Each polyester tablecloth is made from high quality four-way stretched spandex material. Our stretch tablecloths are perfect as a thanksgiving buffet tablecloth, craft show display, cocktail event, outdoor wedding, hotel reception tablecovers, casino tableclothes, tradeshow tablecloth, kitchen linens or any special event. The black stretch tablecloth is machine washable and is a stain and wrinkle resistant stretch cover. The spandex table cloth is made from a stretchy tablecloth material similar to the look and feel of Spandex but much more affordable as a table scrim. The event table cloth features a "pocket" designed to insert each table leg to hold the tablecloth securely in place. This tablecloth fits a rectangular table that measures 48 inches by 30 inches by 30 inches **CARE INSTRUCTION. Machine washable with warm water in gentle cycle. Use normal detergent. Bleach is not recommended. Don't wash with other materials. Wash like colors together. Tumble dry with low temperature or let air dry.
